mapper.delete: delete from sys_user_menu where user_id=#{userId} and permission_=#{permission}
delete from sys_role_menu where role_id=#{roleId} and permission_=#{permission}
mapper.select: select menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName, d.code_ as permission, d.code_text as permissionText from sys_menu m, join sys_dic d where d.code_!='read' and d.type_='CRUD'

select menu.id_ from sys_menu menu where is_show = 1 and (exists (select 1 from sys_user_menu um where um.user_id=#{userId} and um.menu_id=menu.id_) or exists (select 1 from sys_user_role ur join sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id=rm.role_id where ur.user_id=#{userId} and rm.menu_id=menu.id_)) order by parent_id,sort_no

select CONCAT(menu.permission_,'.',um.permission_) permission from sys_menu menu join sys_user_menu um on um.menu_id=menu.id_ where length(menu.permission_)>0 and um.user_id=#{userId} union select CONCAT(menu.permission_,'.',rm.permission_) permission from sys_menu menu join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id=menu.id_ join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id=rm.role_id where length(menu.permission_)>0 and ur.user_id=#{userId}
